email_preview.click_button_below_to_app.translation: Click the button below to log in to {appName}.

email_preview.button_will_expire_in.translation: This button will expire in 10 minutes.

email_preview.confirming_this_request_wi.translation: Confirming this request will securely log you in using **hello@example.com**.

email_preview.if_you_did_not_make_this_r.translation: If you did not make this request, no worries, it's safe to ignore this email.
